While relational databases have been used for decades, and they still are a viable solution for many use cases, many engineers and architects prefer to use NoSQL databases for their numerous advantages over relational databases. In this webinar weâ€™ll discuss the different aspects of migrating from relational databases to NoSQL databases and answer questions.
